game.name: Date Everything!
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Date Everything!은 편안한 집에서 즐길 수 있는 샌드박스형 연애 시뮬레이션으로, 모든 대사를 성우가 연기한 100명의 연애 가능 캐릭터가 등장합니다! 침대와 화재경보기 사이에 로맨스가 흐릅니다. 그리고… 존재에 대한 압도적인 공포 사이에도요! 모든 물건과 연애할 준비가 되셨나요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Date Everything! is a sandbox dating simulator set in the comfort of your own home, featuring 100 fully voice acted datable characters! Let the romance flow between your bed, smoke alarm and… Overwhelming Sense of Existential Dread? Are you ready to Date Everything?

reviewHighlights.text: Bought it to play with my wife, as she is interested in these type of VN games. Me, not so much, but it was worth putting up with this seemingly funny...
My review will contain spoilers. I have no idea if I intend on getting any other endings than the one I got because I decided to leave the house out o...
